content: Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. What is the nursing staff and when a physician or burn surgeon feels that they don’t have the right competency in the nursing staff, they will opt for a split thickness skin graft and because that’s what they’re taught, that’s what the nurses know how to do, and to be honest, there’s not a whole lot that the nurses necessarily need to assist with in the procedure, as opposed to the after care, where the nurses are really involved in a -- in the old model, if you will, with a thickness skin graft. Your line is open.
